prompt: Dame varios peluches del mismo estilo pero con distintos colores

structured_prompt.short_description: A collection of five chibi-style plush toys, each with a distinct color scheme, arranged in a playful group on a clean, minimalist surface. Each plush toy maintains the characteristic large head, small body, and expressive facial features of the original reference, but with varied hair and clothing colors to create a diverse yet cohesive set.

objects.description: A chibi-style plush toy with a large head and small body, featuring spiky red hair and a white face with black and red markings. It has a slightly grumpy expression.
objects.relationship: Part of a group of five plush toys, positioned to the left of the central plush.
objects.shape_and_color: Rounded, predominantly red, white, and black.
objects.texture: Soft, plush fabric with a matte finish.
objects.appearance_details: Spiky red hair, large black eyes with red accents, and black markings on the face.
objects.pose: Sitting with legs bent and arms resting on its lap.
objects.skin_tone_and_texture: Light beige fabric for face and limbs.

lighting.direction: Soft, diffused light from above and slightly in front.
lighting.shadows: Subtle, soft shadows directly beneath and behind the plush toys, indicating a clean light source without harsh contrasts.

aesthetics.composition: Horizontal arrangement of five plush toys, slightly staggered to create visual interest while maintaining a sense of unity. The composition is balanced.

photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on all five plush toys.

structured_prompt.context: This is a product photograph intended for an e-commerce website or a toy catalog, showcasing a collection of stylized plush toys.
